snippet.title: Full Void - Teaser Trailer (v1)
snippet.description:
Full Void is a 2D Puzzle Platformer Adventure set in a dystopian future, where an AI has taken over society. Only children are still free from its control, but for how long?
Scared and alone, a young teenager will have to solve misteries and puzzles to save themself and mankind.
Full Void is coming out in Q3 2023. 
Wish list it now on Steam to make the most of the launch discount. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1859580/Full_Void/
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/outofthebit to keep updated on the development.



What is Full Void? 
Set in a dystopian future, Full Void is a 2D Cinematic Puzzle Platformer telling the story of a young teenager alone in a hostile world controlled by a rogue AI. Fight your way through puzzles and obstacles to uncover the story that surrounds this broken, run down society, where only children are still free. But for how long?

A pure hand drawn pixel art adventure that will keep you on your toes from the very beginning but still suitable for the whole family.

Full Void is a spiritual successor to classic cinematic puzzle platformers such as Prince of Persia, Another World (Out of This World) and Flashback, with a modern twist, innovative visual and gameplay mechanics.

Features
- Environmental Storytelling;
- Ability to hack machinery to solve puzzles;
- Immersive and intense atmosphere;
- Compelling, Amiga MOD sounds;
- Original, hand-drawn pixel art;
